title: Naruto Shippuden Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution MAC
description:
Naruto Shippuden: Ultimate Ninja Storm Revolution is a 3D ninja fighting action with a roster reaching 100 playable characters that spans the entire Naruto and Naruto Shippuden anime arcs.

Also, the game is in english, to change it go to:

Open content package on the wrapper-->Contents--->Resources--->drive_c--->Program files--->Naruto...--->codex.ini

Inside codex.ini: When the text finish you will find:

### Language that will be used in game
###
Language=english<---change it!

If you want the windowed screen go to:

Open content package on the wrapper-->Contents--->Resources--->drive_c--->Program files--->Naruto...--->NSUNSR.ini

[screenSetting]
width=1280
height=720
aspectx=16
aspecty=9
ssaa=0
windowed=0<--- 0 is fullscreen; 1 is windowed

PASS: NigaBro_FT
